summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5286 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 18, Randell's 3rd Addition and Block 9, Randell's Addition, being the alley between 36th Avenue and 37th Avenue, from East Pike Street to East Union Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 61145, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund, and authorizing the issuance of bonds.
